p.id as p_id, p.title as p_title, p.content as p_content, p.post_type as p_post_type, p.author_id as p_author_id, p.like_count as p_like_count, p.comment_count as p_comment_count, p.view_count as p_view_count, p.images as p_images, p.status as p_status, p.created_at as p_created_at, p.mark as p_mark, p.favorite_count as p_favorite_count,
c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name, c.breed as c_breed, c.gender as c_gender, c.age_months as c_age_months, c.health_status as c_health_status, c.description as c_description, c.photos as c_photos, c.is_neutered as c_is_neutered, c.vaccination_status as c_vaccination_status, c.status as c_status, c.shelter_id as c_shelter_id, c.created_by as c_created_by, c.like_count as c_like_count, c.comment_count as c_comment_count, c.view_count as c_view_count, c.favorite_count as c_favorite_count, c.created_at as c_created_at, c.updated_at as c_updated_at FROM user_favorites uf LEFT JOIN community_posts p ON uf.target_type = 'POST' AND uf.target_id = p.id LEFT JOIN stray_cats c ON uf.target_type = 'CAT' AND uf.target_id = c.id WHERE uf.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uf.created_at DESC
